summary: An arena has opened, but do you dare challenge it?
descriptionHtml:
[b][u][size=50][color=lightblue] Base Story [/color][/size][/u][/b]
A small based arena built into the cliffs of markarth by the dwemer in older times has been uncovered,
the people of Markarth noticed the potential wealth this arena could create and hence opened it to the world, people have already begun to take hold of great arena titles, but have you the strength and cunning to take it from them?

[b][u][size=50][color=red] Known Compatibility Problems [/color][/size][/u][/b]
Open Cities Skyrim [size=small]by Arthmoor : [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8058/?] LINK [/url][/size]

[b][u][size=20][color=lightgreen] Credit [/color][/size][/u][/b]

CaBaL120 - aMidianBorn hd textures
author: Slaugh7er
